articles.description: Find out why Raveena Tandon turned down 'Kuch Kuch Hota Hai' and the reasons behind her decision. Karan Johar holds her accountable for not taking the role played by Rani Mukerji. Learn more about Raveena's perspective and her upcoming projects.

articles.author: Vishakha Pandit
articles.title: Munawar Faruqui Confirms Sending Rishtas to Anjali Arora, Ayesha Khan On Bigg Boss 17 - Times Now
articles.description: Bigg Boss 17's last night's episode (January 14) saw Karan Johar slamming Isha Malviya over her statement towards Munawar Faruqui. Later, Abhishek Kumar was seen talking about Ayesha Khan's claims about Munawar Faruqui sending rishtas to five girls. The stand…

articles.author: Nikita Thakkar
articles.title: Bigg Boss 17: Aishwarya Sharma has a major complaint against Salman Khan; '100 achaiyo mein ek buraai...' - Bollywood Life
articles.description: Bigg Boss 17: Aishwarya Sharma and Neil Bhatt were a part of Salman Khan's show. Post eviction, the stars are talking about their journey and more.
articles.content: Apart from Vicky Jain and Ankita Lokhande, one more married couple entered the Bigg Boss 17 house. We are talking about Neil Bhatt and Aishwarya Sharma. The Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin stars had a s… [+2660 chars]
